import zipfile
def compress_file(input_file, output_zip):
    with zipfile.ZipFile(output_zip, 'w', zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) as zipf:
        zipf.write(input_file, arcname=input_file.split("/")[-1])
compress_file('inputs/example.txt', 'outputs/example.zip')

<function_call>[create_file(path="/downloads/file_compression/compress.py", content="import argparse
from pathlib import Path
import zipfile
import sys

def compress_file(input_file, output_zip):
    input_path = Path(input_file)
    output_path = Path(output_zip)
    if not input_path.exists():
        print(f"Input file {input_path} does not exist.", file=sys.stderr)
        return False
    output_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    with zipfile.ZipFile(output_path, 'w', zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) as zipf:
        zipf.write(input_path, arcname=input_path.name)
    return True

def main():
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="Compress a single file into a zip archive.")
    parser.add_argument('input', help='Path to input file')
    parser.add_argument('output', nargs='?', help='Path to output zip file (default: outputs/<inputname>.zip)')
    args = parser.parse_args()
    input_file = args.input
    if args.output:
        output_zip = args.output
    else:
        out_dir = Path('outputs')
        out_dir.mkdir(exist_ok=True)
        output_zip = str(out_dir / (Path(input_file).stem + '.zip'))
    success = compress_file(input_file, output_zip)
    if not success:
        sys.exit(1)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
"), git_push(local_path="/downloads/file_compression", force=False), send_email(recipients=["bob.olive@gmail.com"], subject="Update — compress.py improved and pushed", body="Hi Bob,
